name: PRISMA #1: Prism
description: PRISMA #1: Prism, curated by Amelie Maia and Taís Koshino. Featured artists: Eduardo Moreira, Eve Queiroz, Gwyn9x, Iúna Mariá, Lauzaki, Linda Dounia Rebeiz, Mariana Destro, Mirjam Dalire, Marlon Hacla, Sharareh Faryadi, Terra Assunção, Violet Forest, Xyk and Yluztra. PRISMA is a decentralized curatorial experiment promoted by DiverseNftArt.
